dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so like, this whole thing about visas, is it actually happening? Or is it just talk?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so like, this whole thing about visas, is it actually happening? Or is it just talk?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Guest
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, it's definitely happening, um, Host_A. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs just, uh, shared all the details, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, it's definitely happening, um, Host_A. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs just, uh, shared all the details, actually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has shared the details.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but like, who's doing this? Is it just Kazakhstan saying they want it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but like, who's doing this? Is it just Kazakhstan saying they want it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Guest
dialogue_turns.text: No, no. The EU member states, they've actually approved the mandate for the European Commission to, like, conduct these negotiations. So it's, it's pretty official.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no. The E U member states, they've actually approved the mandate for the European Commission to, like, conduct these negotiations. So it's, it's pretty official.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The mandate to conduct negotiations on the agreement has been approved by the EU member states and granted to the European Commission.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Negotiations for what, though? Just like, making it easier?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Negotiations for what, though? Just like, making it easier?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Guest
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! They're looking at things like, um, reducing the processing times for applications, which is huge, and, uh, fewer documents you need.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! They're looking at things like, um, reducing the processing times for applications, which is huge, and, uh, fewer documents you need.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Negotiations on this agreement include measures such as reducing application processing times, decreasing the list of required documents...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Fewer documents? Seriously? That's always such a pain, like, with all the paperwork.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fewer documents? Seriously? That's always such a pain, like, with all the paperwork.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Guest
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? And, uh, they're also talking about lowering the visa fees, which, you know, is always good.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? And, uh, they're also talking about lowering the visa fees, which, you know, is always good.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, so cheaper and faster? What about, like, getting a visa more than once?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, so cheaper and faster? What about, like, getting a visa more than once?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Guest
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. They want to expand the issuance of multiple-entry visas. And with, you know, longer validity periods too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. They want to expand the issuance of multiple-entry visas. And with, you know, longer validity periods too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...expanding the issuance of multiple-entry visas with longer validity periods...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That sounds, um, really good. Is there a date for when this all starts?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That sounds, um, really good. Is there a date for when this all starts?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Guest
dialogue_turns.text: Not yet, unfortunately. The Ministry didn't specify. It'll be after, uh, negotiations with the European side are totally complete.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not yet, unfortunately. The Ministry didn't specify. It'll be after, uh, negotiations with the European side are totally complete.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry did not specify when the agreement will be signed. A concrete date will be determined after negotiations with the European side are completed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, no idea? But it will happen?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, no idea? But it will happen?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Guest
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, after they complete internal procedures. The goal is, uh, to expand travel for Kazakhstanis and boost business.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, after they complete internal procedures. The goal is, uh, to expand travel for Kazakhstanis and boost business.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The changes will come into effect after the parties complete the necessary internal procedures. The Ministry emphasized that the signing of this agreement will expand travel opportunities for Kazakhstanis to European countries and will contribute to increased business activity...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Business? How so?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Business? How so?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Guest
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's meant to increase, like, trade and economic activity, and also cultural-humanitarian connections, which is a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's meant to increase, like, trade and economic activity, and also cultural-humanitarian connections, which is a big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...will contribute to increased business activity in the trade-economic and cultural-humanitarian spheres.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, this isn't just a rumour then. Like, who even brought this up initially?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, this isn't just a rumour then. Like, who even brought this up initially?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Guest
dialogue_turns.text: Actually, Kaja Kallas, she's the High Representative for Foreign Affairs, she announced the start of this whole procedure recently during a meeting with President Tokayev.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Actually, Kaja Kallas, she's the High Representative for Foreign Affairs, she announced the start of this whole procedure recently during a meeting with President Tokayev.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...during a recent meeting with President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, the High Representative of the European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy " Vice-President of the European Commission Kaja Kallas " announced the launch of the procedure for concluding an agreement to simplify the visa issuance process between the European Commission and Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, okay. So it's, like, from the top.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, okay. So it's, like, from the top.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Guest
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely. And President Tokayev, he said Kazakhstan, uh, received the news very positively. It opens up, you know, wide opportunities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, definitely. And President Tokayev, he said Kazakhstan, uh, received the news very positively. It opens up, you know, wide opportunities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The head of state emphasized that this news is received very positively in Kazakhstan, as this step opens up wide opportunities for strengthening people-to-people contacts and business ties with European countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wide opportunities, huh? For what, like, people-to-people stuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wide opportunities, huh? For what, like, people-to-people stuff?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Guest
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, strengthening people-to-people contacts, and, uh, business ties with European countries too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, strengthening people-to-people contacts, and, uh, business ties with European countries too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...this step opens up wide opportunities for strengthening people-to-people contacts and business ties with European countries.
